dublinCore.dc:title: 119 S151 IS: Protecting Americans from Tax Hikes on Imported Goods Act of 2025
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mrs. Shaheen (for herself, Mr. Wyden, and Mr. Kaine) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

form.official-title: To exclude the authority to impose duties and tariff-rate quotas from the International Emergency Economic Powers Act.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Protecting Americans from Tax Hikes on Imported Goods Act of 2025.

section.header: Exclusion of authority to impose duties and tariff-rate quotas from International Emergency Economic Powers Act
section.text: Section 203 of the International Emergency Economic Powers Act (50 U.S.C. 1702) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: by redesignating subsection (c) as subsection (d); and
by inserting after subsection (b) the following:
The authority granted to the President by this section does not include the authority to impose or increase a duty, or to impose a tariff-rate quota, on an article entering the United States.
The limitation under paragraph (1) does not prohibit the President from excluding all articles, or all of a certain type of article, imported from a country from entering the United States.
